list.name: Changes
list.comment: chore: set `hugo-toha/toha` to `v4.0.0` and `ionrock/cachecontrol` to `v0.12.12` for dependency management

task.summary: Default task
feat: add partial for horizontal line
feat: add exports for device and insertScript utilities
feat: implement dynamic theme switching with persistence
feat: introduce PDFViewer class with pdf.js integration
feat: conditionally import 'mermaid' based on FEATURE_FLOWCHART_MERMAID env variable
feat: conditionally import `katex` based on FEATURE_MATH_KATEX env variable
feat: conditionally import `hljs` based on FEATURE_SYNTAXHIGHLIGHT_HLJS env variable
feat: implement dynamic Table of Contents toggle with device-aware behavior
feat: conditionally import `plyr` based on FEATURE_VIDEOPLAYER_PLYR env variable
feat: conditionally import feature-specific modules based on environment flags
feat: import core modules for note, search, single, and home functionalities
feat: import modules for UI components and content categories
feat: generate indexed JSON representation of site's regular pages excluding search
feat: add utility to dynamically insert script tags by source URL
config: set compiler options for base URL and paths in tsconfig
feat: add layout, style files for `posts` section with pagination
template: Generate RSS feed with recent content for site and sections
feat: implement responsive image rendering with various sizes
feat: enhance anchor link generation with safety checks and external link handling
feat: add default hero and author metadata to `default.md`
feat: add achievement entry template with responsive image handling

feat: add ESBuild configuration helper for feature-based optimization
- Enable JS minification. - Conditional source maps based on build environment. - Dynamic `process.env` definitions for enabled features. - Standardized feature and service interface for easy configuration. - Convert site config to corresponding environment variables and service params. - Added process-shim injection for `process.env` handling.

feat: integrate `highlight.js` with dynamic configuration
- Import `highlight.js` and site parameters. - Set default options for syntax highlighting. - Allow additional `hljs` configuration via site parameters. - Apply syntax highlighting to all matching elements on the page.

feat: add automatic rendering of math using KaTeX
- Import KaTeX auto-render module and site parameters. - Define default delimiters for math rendering. - Allow customization of KaTeX options via site parameters. - Initialize math rendering on DOMContentLoaded event.

feat: introduce custom alignment and background for mermaid div
- Set default alignment to center if not specified. - Allow customization of alignment and background color. - Apply alignment and background style to mermaid div. - Ensure mermaid content is rendered safely within the div.

feat: initialize mermaid with dynamic configurations
- Import the mermaid library for flowchart rendering. - Extract mermaid configuration from site parameters. - Ensure mermaid starts on load with the combined options.

feat: enhance experience section with dynamic content
- Display company name with an optional link. - Calculate total duration at a company based on oldest and most recent positions. - Render company overview with markdown support. - Enumerate positions held at the company with their respective durations. - List out responsibilities for each position using markdown rendering.

feat: implement navigation for next and previous pages
- Use sidebar menu to determine the order of pages. - Identify the current page's index in the order. - Determine previous and next pages based on the current page's index. - Display navigation buttons with titles for a more intuitive user experience. - Adjust column width dynamically based on the presence of previous or next pages.

feat: add template for custom CSS overrides
- Provide a starting point for users to add their custom styles. - Include comments for guidance on how to import and use Bootstrap mixins. - Showcase an example of using Bootstrap's responsive breakpoints with mixins.

feat: add style file to enhance PDF viewer aesthetics and user experience
- Style the canvas for the PDF with a border to differentiate it from the surrounding content. - Add `ltr` direction for consistent text rendering. - Hide the paginator and set a centralized style for it. - Create a "loading" spinner animation to indicate when the PDF is being loaded. - Utilize keyframes for a smooth 360-degree rotation effect on the loading spinner.

feat: add active class to current taxonomy term
- Retrieve the specified taxonomy from the site context. - Loop through each term in the taxonomy. - Compare the term title with the current page's title. - If they match, set the `active` CSS class to the term. - Render each term with its corresponding CSS class and link it to its permalink.
feat: add mock process.env object for browser compatibility
feat: integrate `Plyr` video player with configurable options from params
feat: add post card template with hero image, title, summary, and date
feat: implement dynamic column generation based on content split
feat: create main template with common headers, analytics, navbar, sidebar, content, TOC, footer, and scripts

feat: add CSS styles and color palette
- Added new color definitions for headings, paragraphs, iconography, secondary elements, backgrounds, and a range of custom colors. - Simplified smooth scrolling implementation by removing jQuery dependency in favor of a CSS approach. - Introduced a fix for the anchor overlapping issue with the header. - Made tweaks to components like buttons, cards, tables, figures, footer, and others. - Included media queries to ensure responsive design across various devices, including specific rules for devices like iPad Pro, iPhoneX, and Galaxy S5.
deps: set module path and Go version
deps: add npm dependency versions generated by npm and Hugo configurations
feat: add `theme.toml` for `Toha` Hugo theme with portfolio features, multilingual support, and set author and licensing details
deps: add theme dependencies
performance: optimize ESLint performance by excluding `node_modules`
feat: establish consistent coding practices with a tailored ESLint configuration
feat: enhance code readability with specific prettier settings
feat: ensure project consistency by locking to Node.js version
docs: add MIT LICENSE file
feat: add asset files for `posts` section
chore: ignore editor-specific, build, and temporary files to keep the repository clean
chore: set `hugo-toha/toha` to `v4.0.0` and `ionrock/cachecontrol` to `v0.12.12` for dependency management

- Set default alignment to center if not specified. - Allow customization of alignment and background color. - Apply alignment and background style to mermaid div. - Ensure mermaid content is rendered safely within the div.
